languages.text: [Вынуть оружие и лично убить офицера] "В назидание остальным: я не допускал{mf||а} подобного в своем полку — не допущу и на мостике корабля".
[Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."
languages.original_text: [Вынуть оружие и лично убить офицера] "В назидание остальным: я не допускал{mf||а} подобного в своем полку — не допущу и на мостике корабля".

traits.locale_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and neither will I tolerate it on my bridge."
[Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and neither will I tolerate it on my bridge."
[Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and neither will I tolerate it on my bridge."
[Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."
[Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

languages.text: [Deine Waffe ziehen und den Offizier selbst exekutieren] "Das soll dem Rest von Euch eine Lehre sein. Ich habe so ein Verhalten in meinem Regiment nicht geduldet, und ich werde es auch auf meiner Brücke nicht dulden."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe ziehen und den Offizier selbst exekutieren] Das soll dem Rest von Euch eine Lehre sein. Ich habe so ein Verhalten in meinem Regiment nicht geduldet, und ich werde es auch auf meiner Brücke nicht dulden."

languages.text: [Sortir votre arme et exécuter l'officier vous-même] « Que ceci vous serve de leçon à tous : je ne tolérais pas ce genre de comportement dans mon régiment et je ne le tolérerai pas plus sur ma passerelle. »
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [Sortir votre arme et exécuter l'officier vous-même] « Que ceci vous serve de leçon à tous : je ne tolérais pas ce genre de comportement dans mon régiment et je ne le tolérerai pas plus sur ma passerelle. »

languages.text: [拔出武器，亲手处决军官]“记住这个教训。我决不允许我的船员做出这样的行为，也决不允许任何人在我的舰桥上不守规矩。”
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [拔出武器，亲手处决军官]“记住这个教训。我决不允许我的船员做出这样的行为，也决不允许任何人在我的舰桥上不守规矩。”

languages.text: [武器を取り士官を処刑する]「これをお前たち残り全員の教訓にすることだ。このような振る舞いは我が連隊でも、ブリッジでも許さん」
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [武器を取り士官を処刑する]「これをお前たち残り全員の教訓にすることだ。このような振る舞いは我が連隊でも、ブリッジでも許さん」

languages.text: [Sacar tu arma y ejecutar al oficial personalmente] «Que esto sirva como lección para el resto: no toleraba este tipo de conducta en mi regimiento, y no lo toleraré en mi puente».
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [Sacar tu arma y ejecutar al oficial personalmente] «Que esto sirva como lección para el resto: no toleraba este tipo de conducta en mi regimiento, y no lo toleraré en mi puente».

languages.text: [Silahını çek ve subayı bizzat idam et] "Bu, hepinize ders olsun. Alayımda böyle davranışlara müsamaha göstermedim, burada da göstermem."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon and execute the officer personally] "Let this be a lesson to the rest of you: I did not tolerate such conduct in my regiment, and I will not tolerate it on my bridge."

traits.locale_text: [Silahını çek ve subayı bizzat idam et] "Bu, hepinize ders olsun. Alayımda böyle davranışlara müsamaha göstermedim, burada da göstermem."
